bibl.title: A Grammar of the Greek Papyri of the Roman and Byzantine Periods. I. Phonology.

series.title: Testi e Documenti per lo studio dell'Antichità.

bibl.note: Vol. II: Morphology, to appear in 1977 [published in 1981]. - Vol. III-IV: Syntax, in preparation.
bibl.seg: Gignac Francis T., A Grammar of the Greek Papyri of the Roman and Byzantine Periods. I. Phonology. (Testi e Documenti per lo studio dell'Antichità. LV.)
Vol. II: Morphology, to appear in 1977 [published in 1981]. - Vol. III-IV: Syntax, in preparation.

C.R. par J. Alsina, StPap 18 (1979) pp. 41-42. - R. Browning, CR N.S., 29 (1979) pp. 92-94. - J. Irigoin, REG 91 (1978) pp. 208-209. - G.D. Kilpatrick, NT 24 (1982) pp. 190-192. - M. Leroy, AntCl 48 (1979) pp. 341-342. - L.S.B. MacCoull, The Catholic Biblical Quarterly 40 (1978) pp. 272-273. - B.G. Mandilaras, Gnomon 51 (1979) pp. 114-117. - C. Milani, Aegyptus 58 (1978) pp. 303-304. - J.F. Oates, CJ 75 (1980) pp. 262-263. - Gunter Poethke, ArchPF 30 (1984) pp. 116-117. - J. Schwartz, REA 80 (1978) p. 335. - J.A. Straus, RBPhil 57 (1979) p. 164. - L. Threatte, CW 72 (1978) pp. 41-43. - M. van Esbroeck, EtCl 45 (1977) p. 289.
